name: Extracta
title: extracta.ai
shortDescription: Extracta.ai simplifies data extraction from documents and images using AI, without the need for training. It's designed for businesses needing to automate the processing of various document types like invoices, resumes, and contracts. An example use case is a company automating data entry from scanned invoices into their accounting system.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: ABBYY FlexiCapture
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Advanced OCR and form processing capabilities.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Docparser
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Strong parsing options for various document types.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Kofax Capture
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Integrates with existing systems and processes.
